about_the_game:
A collection of every track composed for "Tyrion Cuthbert: Attorney of the Arcane".

Tyrion Cuthbert: Attorney of the Arcane is a visual novel inspired by the Ace Attorney series. You play as defense attorney: Tyrion Cuthbert who practices law in a world of fantasy and wizards. You must defend clients accused of various crimes committed using magic and use the rules of magic to prove them innocent.
